public abstract class OANotificationBubbleView
extends com.hitlabnz.androidar.viewcomponents.ViewComponent

MapBubble displays basic info about a scene with a callout to the scene's position on the map

setupNotificationView

public abstract android.view.View setupNotificationView()
Override this method to provide view to show in the notification bubble. This method is called back from the constructor of this class.

Returns:
the view to show

updatePoint

public void updatePoint(android.graphics.Point point)
Override this method to update the point on the screen the notification bubble is pointing at. Default implementation does nothing, maintaining the last set point.

Parameters:
point - the point to update
